panels.description: Prometheus Memory Usage in relation to total memory available
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Resident set memory size is number of memory pages the process has in real memory, with pagesize. This results in the amount of memory that belongs specifically to that process in bytes. This excludes swapped out memory pages.
panels.title: Resident Memory

panels.description: Percentage of uptime during the most recent $interval period.  Change the period with the 'interval' dropdown above.
panels.title: Uptime [$interval]

panels.description: Total number of time series in prometheus
panels.title: Total Series

panels.description: The number of bytes that are currently used for local storage by all blocks.
panels.title: Local Storage

panels.description: Samples Ingested per second through scraping activity
panels.title: Samples Ingested /s

panels.description: The total number of rule group evaluations missed due to slow rule group evaluation.
panels.title: Missed Iterations [$interval]

panels.description: The total number of rule group evaluations skipped due to throttled metric storage.
panels.title: Skipped Iterations [$interval]

panels.description: Total number of scrapes that hit the sample limit and were rejected.
panels.title: Tardy Scrapes [$interval]

panels.description: Number of times the database failed to reload block data from disk.
panels.title: Reload Failures [$interval]

panels.description: Sum of all skipped scrapes
panels.title: Skipped Scrapes [$interval]

panels.description:
Rule-group evaluations 
 - total
 - missed due to slow rule group evaluation
 - skipped due to throttled metric storage
panels.title: Rule Evaluator Iterations

panels.description: Rate of dropped samples divided by sum of rate of succeeded and rate of dropped samples.
panels.title: Sample success rate

panels.description: Actual divided by desired shards.
panels.title: Shard rate

panels.description: The number of shards used for parallel sending to the remote storage.
panels.title: Actual shards

panels.description: The number of shards that the queues shard calculation wants to run based on the rate of samples in vs. samples out.
panels.title: Desired shards

panels.description: The maximum number of shards that the queue is allowed to run.
panels.title: Max shards

panels.description: The capacity of each shard of the queue used for parallel sending to the remote storage.
panels.title: Shard capacity

panels.description: Total number of samples successfully sent to remote storage.
panels.title: Samples sent succssfully

panels.description: Samples in to remote storage, compare to samples out for queue managers
panels.title: Samples In

panels.description: The number of samples pending in the queues shards to be sent to the remote storage.
panels.title: Pending samples

panels.description: Total number of samples which were dropped after being read from the WAL before being sent via remote write.
panels.title: Dropped samples

panels.description: Duration of sample batch send calls to the remote storage.
panels.title: Batch send duration

panels.description: Total number of samples which failed on send to remote storage, non-recoverable errors.
panels.title: Failed samples

panels.description: The capacity of each shard of the queue used for parallel sending to the remote storage.
panels.title: Shard capacity

panels.description: The total number of bytes sent by the queue.
panels.title: Bytes sent

panels.description:
Actual: The number of shards used for parallel sending to the remote storage.

Desired: The number of shards that the queues shard calculation wants to run based on the rate of samples in vs. samples out.
panels.title: Shards: actual vs. desired

panels.description:
Min: The minimum number of shards that the queue is allowed to run.

Max: The maximum number of shards that the queue is allowed to run.
panels.title: Shards: min vs. max

panels.description: All non-zero failures and errors
panels.title: Failures and Errors

panels.description: Rate of total number of appended samples
panels.title: Appended Samples per Second

panels.description: Total number of syncs that were executed on a scrape pool.
panels.title: Scrape Sync Total

panels.description: Actual interval to sync the scrape pool.
panels.title: Target Sync

panels.title: Rejected Scrapes

panels.title: GC Rate / 2m
